TopicTitle: Is the Monolith at the KSC missing?

Articles.Content: Is that big Black stone that said "Squad" with the Squad logo that was north of the KSC missing I can no longer find it.
No, it's still there, unless they removed it since I played two days ago. I saw it when I was roving around the KSC.

> 
> No, it's still there, unless they removed it since I played two days ago. I saw it when I was roving around the KSC.

 Lol thanks.You were right I was just being incredibly stupid xD.

Yet mine is still a square dwarf, or half-buried in the ground.

This is kinda disheartening for our **K**yÃƒÂ¶rgy Ligeti chorale.

[![752927KSPminimonolith01540.jpg](http://img11.hostingpics.net/pics/752927KSPminimonolith01540.jpg)](http://www.hostingpics.net/viewer.php?id=752927KSPminimonolith01540.jpg)

Singing the *Lux Aeterna* alone is rather difficult.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T00:22:33Z" title="05/30/2015 12:22  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by Plume & Akakak**
From the starting position on the runway, move out at a heading of 45 degrees. You'll see it off to the left, before you run into the water.
It is a little bit Underground since 1.0.
